item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 22: The Ethos Problem
item.description: Aristotle gave us the language we still use for persuasion: logos, pathos, ethos. Logic, emotion, credibility. Part 12 of this series examined how AI systems learn to persuade, optimizing influence while (hopefully) respecting autonomy. But I glossed over something that deserves its own examination.
